reasoning: Codigo conciso e idiomatico para calcular media com protecao contra divisao por zero. Usa operador ternario adequadamente. Nomes de metodos descritivos. Formato single-line e aceitavel para logica simples. Poderia usar 0.0 em vez de 0.0d. Legibilidade muito boa.

reasoning: Method name and parameter are clear in Portuguese. Logic is correct and well parenthesized. However the if else structure is redundant since the condition already returns a boolean. This is a common beginner pattern that reduces conciseness. The complex condition is standard for leap years but could benefit from a comment. Overall readable but not idiomatic.

name: Combine.java

Font validation logic is unclear and potentially unsafe. No comments explaining purpose. Method has side effects on instance state. Simple structure but requires mental effort to understand due to language mixing and unclear intent.

Em geral, excelente legibilidade com pequenos ajustes possiveis.
